We enable SERVICE PROVIDERS plug-and-play video surveillance offering Iveda hands you a fully-packaged Sentir cloud video surveillance platform, ready for bundling with your current offerings to your customers. Plug-and-play video surveillance for your customers Install Sentir at your datacenter, no upfront cost We enable plug-and-play video surveillance for your customers Ask us about our Sentir Licensing Program for fast go-to-market Immediate positive cashflow -Earn recurring monthly revenue -What you sell this month, becomes a perpetual revenue It all adds up! -Increase annual revenue per user (ARPU) -Enhance customer loyalty -No upfront fees, pay per camera activation Sentir is True Cloud Video Surveillance Platform Big Data Storage Technology - Software-Defined Storage - Scale-Out Storage - Online Replication - Thin Provisioning - Server Virtualization Environment Our Business Model Telcos ISPs Dealers and Integrators Cable Service Providers Home SMBs Enterprise Government Service Providers End Users Cloud Video Surveillance and Data Management Platform for licensing to telcos, data centers, ISPs, and other service providers. Sentir® is Iveda's proprietary cloud video surveillance and data management platform. The platform features video streaming and BIG DATA storage technology. It has the functionality of traditional DVRs (digital video recorders) and NVRs (network video recorders), but delivered from the cloud as an application. Iveda licenses Sentir to telecoms, data centers, ISPs, and cable service providers around the world for fast go-to-market implementation within their global infrastructure. It is easy to deploy and requires minimal capital investment. It utilizes and optimizes existing data center resources. Sentir is flexible and scalable, ideal for large number of subscribers. Iveda has over 10 years of experience in the security technology industry, espousing cloud-based video technology since its inception. Cloud Video Surveillance Offering for Service Providers Sentir enables telecoms and other service providers a video surveillance as a service (VSaaS) offering to their customers on a subscription basis. The offering is designed as a monthly service for the mass market. VSaaS is another value-add service for their customers that can be bundled with their existing products. Consequently, enhancing customer value, satisfaction, and loyalty. In addition, this will help telecoms penetrate the managed video surveillance market, differentiating themselves and gaining significant competitive edge over their competitors. To simplify and expedite going to market, Iveda' s offering includes ZEE® plug and play IP cameras ideal for mass distribution. These cameras are easy to set up – no technical expertise required – and easy to maintain. The ZEE camera line includes indoor, outdoor, fixed, and PT (Pan/Tilt) cameras. Iveda also offers IvedaHome home automation and security system. IvedaHome is easy to install, because it runs on WiFi. It uses a smartphone or tablet to manage and access the system from the cloud. ZEE® wireless cameras are enabled for Sentir® cloud-video surveillance and data management platfrom. These are inexpensive, plug and play IP cameras. Especially designed with consumers and small businesses in mind,Sentir-hosted ZEE eliminates the many hours of network setup and upkeep. With Sentir, cameras in numerous locations may be accessed on one online dashboard on virtually any Internet-enabled smartphone, tablet or computer, wherever you are in the world. Because ZEE is hosted in the cloud, there is no video degradation regardless of the number of simultaneous users. The solution provides an inexpensive and easy to install enterprise-level video surveillance solution for home, business, and government entities. The ZEE camera line includes indoor, outdoor, fixed, and PT (Pan/Tilt) cameras. Request Information Watch video featuring sample applications. Applications ZEE Features and Benefits Easy to set up WiFi Cameras Day/night Portable – easy to relocate Continuous recording in the cloud 24/7 Web access to live & recorded video Manage all your cameras on a single dashboard Remote access from computer, smartphone or tablet Alert notifications on phone, not using text messaging Cloud-stored video is safe from being stolen or destroyed Share video with multiple users with no video degradation Web-based, no proprietary software to install Play downloaded video on any video player, no software required Display live video from your smartphone on the same ZEE dashboard Watch video highlighting ZEE's features and benefits. Watch simple ZEE set up steps.
